Bias Insights
Bias Insights Good Samaritan Christian Marriott died after being hit by a car while helping an unconscious woman involved in a row in Sheffield. The 23-year-old man involved in the incident has been arrested on suspicion of murder, and another man, aged 55, was arrested on suspicion of attempted murder. The victim's family described Marriott as a "wonderful husband, dad, brother, uncle" who showed kindness by coming to the aid of others.
